FuncDef: The display energy-mode mode command displays the energy saving mode of the Router.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of the AP device.
In VS mode, this parameter is supported only by the admin VS.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8191.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to learn the energy saving mode of the Router, run the display energy-mode mode command.
